website_summaries.verdict: High-end hunting slingshot that is simple to shoot accurately.
pros: Wide-bow design helps maximize your power
Triple-strength rubber bands deliver outstanding durability
Adjustable handle for maintaining a steady grip
Includes laser flashlight holder for nighttime use
cons: Rubber bands tend to wear down and discolor over time

customer_reviews.title: Packs a Punch!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed! This slingshot is totally legit, built solid and feels great in hand. I was having a bit of trouble with accuracy my first day (long time since I used one of these) but by the next day I improved quite a lot! But yeah, this thing certainly packs enough power to be lethal for small game, pest, rodents, etc. Regardless for why you purchase this slignshot it will provide you without countless hours of enjoyment and that’s really what it is all about :)
customer_reviews.author: E. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Flashlight built wrong and doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Love the slingshot. Too bad the flashlight doesn't work. Tried to put the batteries in and the battery case is built wrong. Two springs in one spot and two flat connections in another. The third was fine. But regardless the flashlight is worthless. Thinking of returning the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: CARMELLA PLAGE

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should, I'm impressed. I bought it for a varmint, but ended up not using it for that. But I'm pretty sure it can take small critters. Feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny A.

customer_reviews.title: Very tough and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and tough design! The slingshot itself is awesome, but I don't recommend using the flashlight attachment. It comes loose and never fully tightens down, plus the flashlight isn't the best either. The slingshot on the other hand is amazing, took a little getting used too, since I'm use to single band style, but once I dialed it in I was nailing soda cans and water bottles at 8 to 10yds. Going to take it squirrel hunting next! Buy this slingshot you'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Damion

customer_reviews.title: Super Sick Slingshot
customer_reviews.text: Everything is pretty solid about the product. Look up how to shoot it first though. Takes practice but this thing lauches small rocks incredibly far! The piece by my wrist is a little loose but does not affect performance! BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: powerful
customer_reviews.text: well made, good price and definitely powerful delivery of projectiles
customer_reviews.author: Robert T.

customer_reviews.title: Broke on third shot!
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box it looked nice. On the third shot the band broke through the leather ammo holder.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Berger

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This came with a lot more than I expected! Two spare (3 band) replacement bands, a torch/laser with attachment, and a nice foam lined case. It needs to be screwed together but that’s easy, and comes with all the necessary tools. It also comes with a hundred x 3/8 steel ammo bearings, and I easily shot it through several layers of the Amazon cardboard box it came in, from about 15 feet. I’m sure with a little practice it is going to be pretty accurate. I recommend setting up a sheet or similar behind the target because when it guess through both layers I couldn’t find the BB in the grass. lol
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly dangerous, terribly made.
customer_reviews.text: So it’s made in China of course it’s probably gonna be kind of crappy... I almost had 100 rounds sent through it, on the 99th round The top fork broke in half and came slinging back at my face. I would definitely go with a different brand And do your research on your own for the better types of slingshots out there, this one was complete garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kortus

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money, but be prepared to break some bands
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent value for what you spend. It comes with a lot of stuff. The flashlight/laser works well though accuracy is in the hands of the shooter. I had bands start to break on day one of use, but i just tied them off and put them back on. Its not the highest quality but then again you aren't paying big bucks for it. The frame should last and replacement / upgraded bands are available if needed.
customer_reviews.author: M FN K

customer_reviews.title: good slingshot
customer_reviews.text: This is a good slingshot. Its pretty much all metal. Put a hole completely through a coke can at about 10 feet away. Just getting used to it and practicing at that close distance. I have nothing negative to say about it. Its a good slingshot.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ciriello

customer_reviews.title: have two boys
customer_reviews.text: Every boy needs a slingshot, we do live in the city but are going to give this as a Christmas gift and take to the mountains. We have a cabin there, fewer windows and such. I did take it out of the package and it is very cool. Every boy needs a slingshot for target practice. This is certainly a very cool one. Wrist rocket is the key work, gives you so much power and leverage.
customer_reviews.author: MikeSmith

customer_reviews.title: Worthless pot metal casting broke before the first shot.
customer_reviews.text: Grip, Yoke and bottom cap looked like machined Aluminium in the listing photos. Truth is that all 3 parts are cast pot metal or Zinc. Bottom cap broke and threads tore out before I could even make first shot. Avoid this at any price. There was a reason it was on sale. No option to give 0 stars that it deserves. Retired HP Quality Engineer.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Patrick R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money buy a daisy
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy. After a couple of uses the bow broke in half. There are a couple of Nicks to the aluminum but it should not have snapped.? Just not worth the money just buy a daisy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sling shot
customer_reviews.text: Strong built with extra bands. Only dislike is with flashlight/ laser attached you cant fold wrist support. Comes with nice box to store everything.
customer_reviews.author: Epicnut

customer_reviews.title: Very good sling shot
customer_reviews.text: Very good sling shot shoots strong and well made have bought two will buy more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, slingshot broke during first use.
customer_reviews.text: Pulled back and the clasp on bottom broke and now is unusable. It is cheap for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: jesse wade sisco

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Say hello to my little friend. I never used one before but I was accurate on my first try.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: when you need it
customer_reviews.text: I got it and the earth pellets for target pacts
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. The bearing balls it comes with get over 7 second airtime if shot almost straight up (not recommend). Very dangerous to do. I was in the middle of a huge lake with no cars or people around me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Simodi

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Missing peices, no flashlight, extra Allen wrenches, no English instructions. Terrible all around.
customer_reviews.author: Regena

customer_reviews.title: Your product is non functional..Not egfective
customer_reviews.text: The leather strap, where you the pellets, is so narrow..that you cannot hold tightly, before firing sling...so actually tjis sling shot is NO...good...LEATHER STRAP SHOULD BE WIDER...so there's something hold on...
customer_reviews.author: Pedro O. Servano IV

customer_reviews.title: Quality #1++++
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and easy to assemble and use..At 72 YOA I need to wear my glasses
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This product was a Christmas gift but all the men loved it.
customer_reviews.author: L. L. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: If you want a solid slingshot this is definitely it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Catlett

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a slingshot to take down some squirrels and bought this after reading lots of great reviews. I’m not an experienced slingshot hunter, but I found it very difficult to be accurate with and it lacks the amount of power I was looking for the hunt squirrels. I was disappointed that there was no users manual or any instructions, and I broke a band the first day I had it. This might be a fun slingshot for plinking cans, but if you are looking for something to hunt squirrels with, I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No instructions, maybe they figured I would know what I'm doing ... And they are lucky
customer_reviews.text: No instructions? Good thing I know WTF I'm doing. I would be disappointed had I not.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac B.

customer_reviews.title: Missing flash light
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the was an open box item, ans the flash light is missing.
customer_reviews.author: Antolin Menenddez

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Nice slingshot, it is a made of durable material. Definitely not cheap and my son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Lol
customer_reviews.text: Lol wrist attachment broke literally the first time I pulled the band back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for an inexpensive slingshot
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for $20 and it was hitting targets 30 ft away right out of the box. It's a little cheap feeling but is solid. Good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy C

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The sling shot is well made(metal), feel good in your hand, and has a nice case. But it loses a star because the cheap plastic flashlight holder you can put on the bottom of the handle. Doesn't really fit so you can maybe buy a proper flashlight holder.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 1st pull. Cheap soft metal, piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I pulled the sling back the arm brace popped off. When I tried to screw it back on the metal stripped out and wouldn’t allow me to put it back on. Cheap soft metal. This thing is not going to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Shy Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sling shot. It was easy to assemble and after couple tries, my accuracy was better. Is perfect for toy and scaring off animals around the ranch.
customer_reviews.author: Jose F. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: It is JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Rubber bands quickly break, pocket is poorly designed. Almost impossible to aim
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure why this is like this? Maybe someone returned it?
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Since I purchased it, I think I used it a total of about 20 shots or so. Yesterday, when I grabbed it to use it, I noticed that several rubber strings were about to break. Good thing it came with a spare, but then this, too, won't last long. Don't waste your money on this junk. UPDATE (August 23, 2019): As anticipated, one of the spare strings just snapped off IN SPITE OF infrequent use this summer. There's no way that I'm going to spend another penny on strings when knowing that they won't last long. I'm just going to look for another, more durable sling.
customer_reviews.author: S. So

customer_reviews.title: This was a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: This came very quickly and in good condition. I have not removed it from the box as it is a Christmas Gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pellet Size Question??
customer_reviews.text: Would I be able to shoot avocado seeds out of this thing?
customer_reviews.author: Leah Warrington

product_meta.title: ucho Professional Slingshot Set,Outdoor Shot Slingshot Hunting Wrist Rocket Slingshot with High Velocity Catapult for Adult and Kids
feature_bullets: Our professional slingshot for hunting with wide-bow design and triple strength rubber bands,ergonomic molded steady adjustable handle grip feels powerful and comfort in your hand;
Adjustable wrist brace and golden proportions slingshot,folding slingshot,easy to use and convenient for carry,with laser flashlight holder,makes you precision hunting even at nighttime;
Magnetic leather design keep hunting slingshot ammo well,refill the wrist rocket slingshot more quickly.and the running shake and jump does not affect to use;
Used for outdoor competition,fitness catapult,entertainment, competition and hunting, also for boutique collection.
It is prohibited to use this product in anyway that doesn't conform to local, state and federal laws and ordinances.This is not a toy,Children need use under the supervision of adults.
